reviews.title: Run, don't walk Away from this Hotel
Happy With Accommodation
reviews.text: The staff are the rudest people I've ever come in contact with in my life.

We were a little worried about finding good affordable acomodation in Paris and had heard some dreadful reports prior to leaving. However i must say we were very pleased with our choice. The twin room was a decent size, the bathroom you could move in and it had a great kitchenette, with a miocrowave, fridge dishwasher etc. Its in a good quiet location and its only a 5 minute walk to the nearest underground metro station, and also the great resteraunts at the Bercy Village. I would definatley return to this hotel if i ever visit Paris again.
